meanings.definition: Covered with a thin layer of tarnish or oxidation.
meanings.sent1: The old statue had a patined appearance, showing its age.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had a patined frame that added character to the piece.
meanings.sent3: The patined doorknob looked like it had stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box had a patined finish, reminiscent of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The patined surface of the coin made it stand out among the shiny ones.

meanings.definition: Having a green or brown film on the surface, as bronze or copper.
meanings.sent1: The patined copper roof of the old building gave it a rustic charm.
meanings.sent2: The patined bronze statue in the park had a weathered look.
meanings.sent3: The patined garden gnome seemed to blend in with the mossy surroundings.
meanings.sent4: Her patined jewelry had a unique appeal, different from the shiny pieces.
meanings.sent5: The patined surface of the bell had a verdant hue, like aged copper.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the metal patined, adding a vintage touch to the sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The statue patined beautifully, showcasing its history.
meanings.sent3: She decided to let the vase patined naturally, embracing its aging process.
meanings.sent4: The antique car slowly patined, becoming a classic beauty.
meanings.sent5: The old bookshelf patined gracefully, becoming a cherished piece of furniture.
